name: Romulan
description: Romulan, named after the alien Star Trek race, is a powerful indica revered for its potent therapeutic qualities. Though mostly indica, Romulan growers insist sativa genetics have crept in over time, lending it intense cerebral effects. These squat, pine-scented plants produce dense frosty buds that have found their following among connoisseurs in British ColumbiaÂ and the Pacific Northwest. A deep, sedating relaxation makes Romulan a favorite strain for patients treating muscle spasms and nerve damage. Many hybridized variations of Romulan exist, but nearly all can promise a full body calm with heavily intoxicating properties.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Euphoric, Happy, Uplifted, Stress, Pain, Insomnia, Headaches, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Paranoid
